title: Nursing Simulation Learning Transfer Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Core nursing theory and foundational clinical practice knowledge
context.additional_context: A program promoting the transfer of prior learning through simulation-based learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Over 80% of participants achieve the transfer competence to apply theories learned in simulated environments to real clinical situations
Learners can explain at least three connections between simulation design characteristics (patient scenarios, decision-making structures, etc.) and learning transfer
Through team-based simulation activities, learners collaboratively develop and implement transferable problem-solving strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
